com.jcabi.simpledb

Interface Region

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Region.Simple

    @Immutable
public interface Region
    Amazon SimpleDB region.

    It is recommended to use Region.Simple in most cases.

    You can use aws() method to get access to Amazon SimpleDB client directly.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
